summary_20: An MCP server facilitating AI agents' interaction with Google Meet via the Google Calendar API for meeting management and automation.
The Zoom MCP Server lets users manage Zoom meetings via natural language commands, enabling AI-assisted scheduling, deletion, and detail retrieval using the Zoom API.
MCP Atlassian integrates Confluence & Jira with AI assistants, enabling automatic updates, AI-powered search, smart filtering, and content creation via a Docker image.
MCP server for Monday.com, enabling client interaction with boards, items, updates, and documents. Includes tools for creation, retrieval, and modification of Monday.com data.
Find Flights MCP server utilizes Duffel API to search flight information. It supports flexible date searches and complex itineraries via natural conversation.
